findings.title: A potential overflow due to unsafe math
findings.description: In `SwapExecutor` this line `uint256 poolSwapAmount = (balanceToSwap * swap.tokenRatio) / _ONE` allows making overflow.

findings.title: Not effective depositETH() and withdrawETH()
findings.description: `depositETH()` and `withdrawETH()` are inherited and make calls to WETH but the implementation makes Executor call itself (external call), send ETH itself which is useless and can be dropped.
